detailsData.title: Experienced Trial Lawyers
detailsData.content: Over 100 years of combined trial experience, with a track record of nearly $2 billion in compensation for clients.

detailsData.title: Recognized Excellence
detailsData.content: Consistently recognized by various publications and organizations for excellence in legal representation.

detailsData.title: Advocates for Workers' Rights
detailsData.content: Specializing in employment law, protecting workers from discrimination, harassment, and wrongful termination.

address: 10866 Wilshire Blvd. Suite 1400, Los Angeles, CA 90024
subHeading: Aggressive representation for victims of injury, negligence and abuse in LA
valueProp: McNicholas & McNicholas, LLP is a leading personal injury law firm in California, with a reputation for aggressive representation and successful outcomes.
CTA: Los Angeles & California Personal Injury Attorneys

testimonalData.text: Matt McNicholas is a very knowledgeable, approachable and skilled trial lawyer. If you're looking for a firm that provides great service and maximizes your return on a personal injury or employment case, McNicholas & McNicholas is a great option.
testimonalData.author: Spencer Y

testimonalData.text: Juan Victoria and the McNicholas team deserve more than 5 Stars. Words can't describe how grateful I am to have received help from McNicholas law firm. Juan is very SHARP, calm strategic thinker with a very approachable, down to earth manner.
testimonalData.author: Veronica R

testimonalData.text: We like so many others never imagined being involved in a lawsuit. Essentially, we had no choice because of our child's traumatic injuries. It was a very dark place to see our son suffering and to be made to feel as if he was being put on trial by big insurance.
testimonalData.author: Nancy A
